characters.neutral: I only trust medicine and my own intuition.
characters.self: Ha! I’d put my trust in a surgeon with shaky hands before I’d put my trust in one of these fools.

characters.name: bruno
characters.neutral: I trust in my sick painting skills. That’s about it. These other kids can’t even paint stick figures
characters.self: Honestly no one. I can only truly trust myself!
characters.primary: Hmm..if I had to pick someone, I guess I’d say the doctor...at least he’s not a jerk like that jock.

characters.name: Alix
characters.neutral: I trust the institution of science. And maybe the lawyer. That is all.
characters.primary: I trust the lawyer, I suppose, and definitely NOT the Doctor, that kid is always sharpening his surgical tools and acting creepy.

characters.name: Olivia
characters.self: I only trust the law… and my history textbook.
characters.primary: Well, every subject is important...but don’t let the artist know I said that. That kid’s the worst.

characters.name: Duke
characters.self: School is for nerds!!! If I had to choose something though, I guess it’d be history. Because wars are cool.
characters.primary: Eh, I don’t know. The worst subject is probably history though.

Question2.title: What are your plans for after school?

characters.name: greg
characters.neutral: Well, I accidentally swallowed some food coloring earlier today, and I feel like I’m dying, so I’ll probably give myself a medical exam.
characters.self: Oh...not much...probably just going to eat some...food.
characters.primary: I have a playdate with the scientist, but she cancelled last minute for some really shady reason.

characters.name: bruno
characters.neutral: My mom and I are going to take turns cowering in fear in the corner of the room.
characters.self: I dunno, probably work on some sketches. I got a new red paintbrush yesterday.
characters.primary: Well, I was gonna hang out with the jock, but he said he was busy.

characters.name: Alix
characters.neutral: Hanging out with all my friends...the lab rats I’m experimenting on this week.
characters.self: I’ll be in the lab all day reading my history textbook. I don’t want to deal with all of these ridiculous wolf shenanigans.
characters.primary: Well, I’m definitely not hanging out with the doctor...he seems like a pretty sketchy character.

characters.name: Olivia
characters.neutral: Rushing home to watch an episode of Law & Order.
characters.self: Finishing my history homework, obviously. What’s it to ya?
characters.primary: Finishing my history homework, obviously. What’s it to ya? Did that crazy artist put you up to it? He’s always had it out for me.

characters.name: Duke
characters.neutral: Just gonna toss around the ol’ pigskin with my pops!
characters.self: Uh, I don’t know….uh, definitely NOT killing children...
characters.primary: I have practice until late tonight, but I heard that lawyer is up to something suspicious….

Question3.title: What’s your favorite subject in school?

characters.name: greg
characters.neutral: I like to study myself, mostly. It’s a good thing my stethoscope is so reflective!
characters.primary: I hate history, that stupid scientist is always bragging to me about how well he does on all the tests.

characters.name: bruno
characters.neutral: The only subject that matters!! Art, obviously.
characters.self: Is that even a real question? You’ve got to be kidding me.
characters.primary: I stick to science classes obviously, unlike that crazy doctor who likes just about anything - even history! How boring.

characters.name: Alix
characters.self: I have a periodic table comforter and matching pillowcase. Does that answer your question?
characters.primary: I stick to science classes obviously, unlike that crazy doctor who likes just about anything - even history! How boring.

characters.name: Olivia
characters.neutral: History, obviously. Even though the teacher doesn’t exactly teach it very well.
characters.self: I personally love history, however, the artist hates it when I talk about how much I enjoy it.
characters.primary: I personally love history, however, the scientist hates it when I talk about how much I enjoy it.

characters.name: Duke
characters.primary: Does beating up the doctor count? HAA
